rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious corridor that welcomes guests. The entrance is located in the north-east corner as per Vastu guidelines, ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open and airy living space featuring Mediterranean aesthetics with stone accents and a vaulted ceiling. It opens to a semi-outdoor patio.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed with large windows for ample natural light. Vastu compliant placement in south-east.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Mediterranean styled kitchen with modern appliances and an open concept layout. Vastu principles ensure placement in south-west.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. Placed in north-east for Vastu compliance.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with attached storage closet, situated in west to maintain balance.

rooms.name: Home Office/Study
rooms.description: Dedicated space for work or study, placed in south-west to harness the energy of earth element.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment room featuring state-of-the-art audio-visual systems. Vastu guidelines suggest east-west orientation to balance energies.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Outdoor recreational space featuring a swimming pool with Mediterranean landscaping. The pool is designed in the south-west corner to avoid excessive fire element.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility Room
rooms.description: Additional room for storage and utilities, placed strategically near the kitchen area.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Ensures a welcoming energy flow into the house.

openings.name: Balcony Access to Living Room
openings.description: Provides natural light and connects indoors with outdoor space.

openings.name: Window Alcoves in Kitchen
openings.description: Maximizes natural lighting as per Vastu recommendations.

openings.name: Pool Entrance
openings.location: South-West corner of the pool area
openings.description: Ensures safe access to the swimming pool.
